Boot Settings

Figure 7-21 Boot Settings

Table 7-12 Boot Parameters

Field Name

Description

Boot Option Retry

The BIOS retries NON-EFI based boot options without waiting for user input.

Select Disabled, Enabled, or Platform Default.

Intel Entry SAS RAID

The Intel SAS Entry RAID Module is enabled.

Select Disabled, Enabled, or Platform Default.

Intel Entry SAS RAID Module

The Intel SAS Entry RAID Module is configured.

Select it-ir-raid, intel-esrtii or Platform Default.

Onboard SCU Storage Support

The onboard software RAID controller is available to the server.

Select Disabled, Enabled, or Platform Default.
